com.guardtime.ksi.blocksigner

Class KsiBlockSignerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.ksi.blocksigner.KsiBlockSignerBuilder

  • public class KsiBlockSignerBuilder
extends Object
    Provides functionality to obtain KsiBlockSigner object(s), offering multiple methods to configure KsiBlockSigner object.

    The following sample shows how to use KsiBlockSigner class: 

     

 KSISigningClient signingClient = getSigningClient();
 TreeBuilder treeBuilder = new HashTreeBuilder();
 KsiBlockSigner signer = new KsiBlockSignerBuilder()
                 .setKsiSigningClient(signingClient)
                 .setTreeBuilder(treeBuilder)
                 .build();

    • Method Detail

      • setKsiSigningClient

        public KsiBlockSignerBuilder setKsiSigningClient(KSISigningClient signingClient)
        Sets the KSISigningClient. Either this method or setKsiSigningService(com.guardtime.ksi.service.KSISigningService) method should be called.

      • setKsiSigningService

        public KsiBlockSignerBuilder setKsiSigningService(KSISigningService signingService)
        Sets the KSISigningService. Either this method or setKsiSigningClient(com.guardtime.ksi.service.client.KSISigningClient) method should be called.

      • setDefaultHashAlgorithm

        @Deprecated
public KsiBlockSignerBuilder setDefaultHashAlgorithm(HashAlgorithm algorithm)
        Deprecated. Use setTreeBuilder(TreeBuilder) instead.
        Sets the hash algorithm used by HashTreeBuilder.

      • setSignatureFactory

        public KsiBlockSignerBuilder setSignatureFactory(KSISignatureFactory signatureFactory)
        Sets the KSISignatureFactory. Default value is InMemoryKsiSignatureFactory.

      • setMaxTreeHeight

        public KsiBlockSignerBuilder setMaxTreeHeight(Integer maxTreeHeight)
        Sets the maximum height of the aggregation tree. Default value is Util.MAXIMUM_LEVEL.

      • setTreeBuilder

        public KsiBlockSignerBuilder setTreeBuilder(TreeBuilder treeBuilder)
        Allows to configure a custom TreeBuilder for the local aggregation. If used then the algorithm set by setMaxTreeHeight(Integer) method will be ignored. If this method is not called then HashTreeBuilder will be used for aggregation.

      • setPduVersion

        @Deprecated
public KsiBlockSignerBuilder setPduVersion(PduVersion pduVersion)
        Deprecated. 

      • setPduIdentifierProvider

        @Deprecated
public KsiBlockSignerBuilder setPduIdentifierProvider(PduIdentifierProvider pduIdentifierProvider)
        Deprecated. 

      • build

        public KsiBlockSigner build()
